title: HACKED ACOUNT   HELP PLS
body: My acount was hacking and i need help. i know pasword but i cant change email for create a new passwordÂ´. pls help i need my acount

replies.body: Don't worry we can help!  Reach out to our account recovery team through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and we'll assist with recovery as well as updating your info.  Hang tight, we'll see you there!
